pr_title: MMA-8608 Handle duplicate configs after stripping prefix

timeline.message: MMA-8608 Handle duplicate configs after stripping prefix

timeline.bodyText:
Don't you want to try with a different "value" to actually see whether toMap mergefunction got executed and indeed replaces a new value? So maybe
duplicateConfigs.put("key", "value1"); duplicateConfigs.put("schema.registry.key", "value");
timeline.author: bhattas

replies.bodyText: Actually the code (existing, replacement) -> replacement isn't really that meaningful, since most of the time the passed in Map will be a HashMap, and the order of traversal is non-deterministic.   I did verify that if a LinkedHashMap with different values is passed, the last value is retained.
replies.author: rayokota
